creative_descriptions.name: Phone Mockup - Kanban
creative_descriptions.composition: Clean product shot of iPhone showing Clinic app Kanban board. Phone slightly angled. Multiple lead cards visible in pipeline columns. Soft shadow beneath phone.
creative_descriptions.color_usage: White/light gray background. App shows brand colors (indigo, pink accents). Subtle gradient overlay on background.
creative_descriptions.typography: Headline above or below phone in Plus Jakarta Sans Bold. Subtext in Inter Regular. Left-aligned text.
creative_descriptions.imagery_suggestions: Floating UI elements around phone (notifications, lead cards) to show app features. Subtle confetti or sparkle elements for energy.

creative_descriptions.name: Before/After Split
creative_descriptions.composition: Split screen design. Left side: chaotic (phone with overflowing notifications, sticky notes, stressed emoji). Right side: organized (Clinic app, clean pipeline, checkmarks). Clear dividing line.
creative_descriptions.color_usage: Left side: warm, chaotic colors (oranges, reds). Right side: cool, calm colors (brand indigo, greens). High contrast between sides.
creative_descriptions.typography: 'Before' and 'After' labels. Pain point headline on left, benefit headline on right. Clean sans-serif throughout.
creative_descriptions.imagery_suggestions: Icons representing chaos (notification badges, question marks) vs. order (checkmarks, organized lists). Avoid photos of people for simplicity.

creative_descriptions.name: Stats Highlight
creative_descriptions.composition: Bold statistic as focal point (e.g., '35%'). Supporting text explaining the metric. Product screenshot or icon below. Minimal, data-driven design.
creative_descriptions.color_usage: Primary indigo background with white text, OR white background with indigo accent. Statistic number in contrasting color for emphasis.
creative_descriptions.typography: Large display number (48-72px). Supporting text in regular weight. Hierarchy: stat > explanation > CTA.
creative_descriptions.imagery_suggestions: Upward trending arrow or graph element. Small app screenshot or logo. Keep focus on the number.
